extends java.lang.Object

    Mail task - contain task to email: from, to, subject, text, etc.
    Immutable.

        public MailTask(java.lang.String from,

        java.lang.String subject,
        java.lang.String messageBody,
        boolean isHTML)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        from - Field of the future email - From (email part). Email address validation according to RFC 822 standards. Can't be null, can't be empty.
        fromName - Field of the future email - From (name part). Can be empty, not null.
        to - Field of the future email - To (email part). Email address validation according to RFC 822 standards. Can't be null, can't be empty.
        toName - Field of the future email - To (name part). Can be empty, not null.
        subject - Field of the future email - Subject. Can't be null, can't be empty.
        messageBody - Field of the future email - Subject. Can't be null, can't be empty.
